pages.text: $(li)The Librarian is a great erudite.$(br)$(li)It will trade you $(l:patchouli:decoration/vanilla/bookshelf)Bookshelves$(/l), Lanterns, $(l:patchouli:decoration/others/glass)Glass$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/name_tag)Name Tags$(/l), and enchanted books for $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l) and vice versa.$(br)$(li)A Villager can get the Librarian profession if is near a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/lectern)Lectern$(/l).
